mods.abstract: RUN-AWAY FROM the undersigned, on Bayou Courtableau, in this Parish, on the 4th inst., two negro-slaves, to wit : JACQUES, 23 or 24 years old, 5 feet 7 inches high, strong built, and DICK, about 21 years old, 5 feet 3 inches high. Both Speak French and English, and were bought lately at the successional sale of Don Diego A. Larose Fontenot, late of this Parish. A liberal reward will be given to whoever will bring them back to the undersigned, or lodg them in one of the Jails of this State. FELIX GUIBERTEAU. Parish of St. Landry, March 15th, 1856.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
